  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:clao_es_20070119_2_0020519</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020519</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Nacimiento de la República Romana</string>
            <string language="en">The birth of the Roman Republic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Geburt der römischen Republik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La naissance de la République romaine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O nascimento da república roman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La nascita della Repubblica romana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γέννηση της ρωμαϊκής Δημοκρατίας</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Texto en latín breve y sencillo (adaptado) de Eutropio. El contenido del fragmento es el final de la monarquía y la proclamación de la República en Roma.</string>
            <string language="en">A brief and simple (adapted) Latin text by Eutropius about the end of the monarchy and the proclamation of the Republic of Rome.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Roma</string>
            <string language="en">Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">República Romana</string>
            <string language="en">Roman Republic</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein kurzer und einfacher (angepaßter) 
lateinischer Text durch Eutropius über das Ende der Monarchie 
und die Proklamation der Republik von Rom.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un bref et simple texte latin (adapté) par 
Eutropius au sujet de la fin de la monarchie et de la proclamation de 
la République de Rome.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um texto latin (adaptado) breve e simples por 
Eutropius sobre o fim do monarchy e do proclamation da república de 
Roma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un breve e testo latino (adattato) semplice da 
Eutropius circa la conclusione del monarchy e della proclamazione 
della Repubblica di Roma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα συνοπτικό και απλό (προσαρμοσμένο) λατινικό 
κείμενο από Eutropius για το τέλος της μοναρχίας και την 
προκήρυξη της Δημοκρατίας της Ρώμης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Römische Republik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">République Romaine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Roma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">República Roman</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Roma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Repubblica Romana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρώμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρωμαϊκή Δημοκρατία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
